sub_title: Future Readiness Coach: Online and Face2face at Real Solutions Training
summary:
I will accompany you on your journey into the future. 

I have extensive experience in helping entrepreneurs, companies, teams and individuals with real transformation. I combine my knowledge of applied Psychology, Neurodiversity, Programming and Marketing to offer you a unique and comprehensive blueprint for digital marketing and organisational transformation. I started studying human behaviour (Psychology, Applied Psychology, Philosophy & Anthropology) and Marketing before Mark Zuckerberg's birthday.

I am the founder of Real Solutions Training South Africa (1999) and later Real Solutions Training Netherlands. My focus is Future Readiness. I offer practical implementable tools that are based on real life experience. I have experience in different sectors, in different organisations and at different levels including reporting to a CEO.  I am also Neethling Brain Instruments NBI® Master Practitioner and a co-owner of the Dutch agency of this international method. NBI® is the world's largest battery of profiling instruments. We help independent experts who work with people to take their expertise to the next level.

Communication tools: Keynote addresses, online and face-to-face coaching, training, corporate storytelling, and writing.

Websites: makheni.com, diversiteitspecialist.nl, makhenithestoryteller.com, breinvoorkeuren.nl
Latest e-book: The Intersection – where Storytelling, Leadership and Diversity competency meet. (available on makheni.com)
Speaker profile download: makheni.com
Free resources: Channel Makheni on makheni.com
Area of operation: The world

awards.title: Exceptional contributions in promoting Beyonder Creativity throughout the world
awards.description: This award is awarded for travelling internaltionally to make a meaningful contribution to creativity and innovation by presenting keynote addresses and workshops on creativity and innovation

awards.title: Nomination - Woman of the year award
awards.description: The head of the correctional facility nominated Makheni for this prestigious award for the pro-bono work that she does in the community.
awards.issuer: Nominated by the then Head of Mogale correctional service

awards.title: Recognition - One of the top 6 speakers
awards.description: Featured in Femina magazine as one of the top 6 speakers in SA.

awards.title: Best sales personality
awards.description: Manning a stall 'Be your own boss' at the Randfontein show - the stall was awarded the 'Best Stall Award' and Makheni was awarded the 'Best Sales Personality Award'

awards.title: Certificate of Eccellence - Team of the year award
awards.description: Makheni belonged to a team that received this award for exceeding the annual sales target
awards.issuer: Employer - Parke Davis - A division of Warneer Lambert

awards.title: Certificate for over-achievement of the national sales target
awards.description: The award was accompanied by a monetary reward and a trip to the Barcelona Olympics - the first time SA was allowed back in teh Olympics
awards.issuer: Employer - Parke Davis - a Division of Warner Lambert

awards.title: Outstanding Personal Sales Award
awards.description: Exceed target Selling Math programmes part time while doing something else and also studying part time
awards.issuer: Promaths - employed part-time while doing something else

publications.name: The Intersection - where Storytelling, Leadership and Diversity competency meet.

authors.headline: Future Readiness Coach: Online and Face2face at Real Solutions Training
Devoted developer of skills, styles, tools, traits of 1) Productive Leaders, 2) Successful Communicators, 3) Effective Team members & leaders, 4) Thinkers of many types

profile_positions.title: Future Readiness Coach: Online and Face2face

profile_positions.description:
All services in English, Dutch and SA languages 

I accompany organisations, teams and individuals on their journey from good to great! 

 I am the founder of Real Solutions Training South Africa (1999) and later Real Solutions Training Nederland. Our focus is diversity and transformation competency, leadership training and presentation skills. We offer practical implementable tools that are based on real life experience. I have experience in different sectors, in different organisations and at different levels including reporting to a CEO.   I am also Neethling Brain Instruments NBI® Master Practitioner and a co-owner of the Dutch agency of this international method. NBI® is the world's largest battery of profiling instruments. We help independent experts who work with people to take their expertise to the next level.

Communication tools: Keynote addresses, training, online and face-to-face coaching, corporate storytelling, and writing.

Websites: www.beyondmulticulturalism.com, www.diversiteitspecialist.nl, www.makhenithestoryteller.com, www.breinvoorkeuren.nl
Latest e-book: The Intersection – where Storytelling, Leadership and Diversity competency meet. (available on www.beyondmulticulturalism.com)
Speaker profile download: www.beyondmulticulturalism.com
Free resources: Channel Makheni
Area of operation: The world 

Werkt u met mensen? Wilt u uw expertise naar een hogere niveau? Neem a.u.b. contact via de contact pagina van www.breinvoorkeuren.nl
profile_positions.title: Diversity and Leadership specialist, Speaker, Trainer, Coach, Storyteller, MC and Writer

profile_positions.description: Manage the OD department, facilitate a course on organizational culture change, department responsible for individual and team recognition awards as well as climate surveys
profile_positions.title: O D Manager

profile_positions.description: I left a management position to do programming for 3 years. It was in the days when programming meant mainframe. I was privileged to be part of the Y2K project. One of the nights I will always remember is eating pizza and watching the movie Conair in the office in the middle of the night waiting for midnight and a minute later the systems still worked.  High fives! we did it! It was a happy new year!
profile_positions.title: programmer

profile_positions.description: Managing the communication and marketing department as well as the call centre.
profile_positions.title: Communication and Marketing Senior Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: We supported parents of children with mental disabilities
Co-founded the first Aouth African anti-child abuse group
